fields.name: Le Creuset Ceramic Cafetiere French Press - Blue
fields.description: Sturdy enamelled stoneware cafetière French press with stainless steel mesh and plunger

fields.name: Coffee Gator Dual-Wall Insulated Stainless Steel Brewer French Press - Silver
fields.description: This cafetiere is vacuum-layered & double-filtered to extract a fuller flavour. Discover Utopia when you pour a piping-hot cup from our divine coffee decanter

fields.name: Grosche Pyrex Borosilicate Glass Beaker French Press
fields.description: Dual filter system, with the main press being one, and another one in the lid as well. When You make your coffee, turn the lid to close the press while your coffee or tea steeps, and turn it again to open it to pour. That will retain heat and allow for better flavor for your coffee

fields.name: Andronicas Stainless Steel Pour Over Coffee Pot with Manual Dripper - pink
fields.description: Premium coffee brewing tool for a superior coffee experience that makes every cup special

fields.name: Kinto Steel Brewer Stand
fields.description: Made by casting, the brewer stand intrigues with its rough look. It comes with a porcelain brewer with glaze rich in texture. The height of the stand can be adjusted, letting you use it with avarious vessels from a mug to a tall server.

fields.name: Bodum Pour Over Coffee Maker with Filter
fields.description: The Bodum Pour Over Coffee Maker has a fine mesh stainless steel filter that eliminates need for paper filters. This promotes the pure unfolding of the flavor - no more paper filters that trap the essential oils and flavors.

fields.name: Portable Espresso Machine For The Car
fields.description: A perfect fit capsure espresso machine inside your vehicle. It plugs into the 12/24 volt socket and can sit in the cup holder. Reliable, intuitive, nimble and with just the right digital touch, it prepares a prefect espresso, in 2 minutes and a half.

fields.name: Vacuum Coffee Pot
fields.description: The age-old process of siphon brewing is coffee showmanship at its finest, blending art and science with a dash of gravity-defying magic.

fields.name: Le Creuset Ceramic Cafetiere French Press - Red
fields.description: Sturdy enamelled stoneware cafetière French press with stainless steel mesh and plunger

fields.name: Coffee Gator Dual-Wall Insulated Stainless Steel Brewer French Press - Orange
fields.description: This cafetiere is vacuum-layered & double-filtered to extract a fuller flavour. Discover Utopia when you pour a piping-hot cup from our divine coffee decanter

fields.name: Grosche Stainless Steel Plunger Borosilicate Glass Beaker French Press
fields.description: Durable Borosilicate Glass carafe beaker which is heat resistant sits in Stylish insulated plastic frame which make the whole process of making and pouring very easy and prevent wobbling

fields.name: Andronicas Stainless Steel Pour Over Coffee Pot with Manual Dripper - Green
fields.description: Premium coffee brewing tool for a superior coffee experience that makes every cup special

fields.name: Andronicas Stainless Steel Pour Over Coffee Pot with Manual Dripper - Blue
fields.description: Premium coffee brewing tool for a superior coffee experience that makes every cup special

fields.name: Andronicas Stainless Steel Pour Over Coffee Pot with Manual Dripper - Orange
fields.description: Premium coffee brewing tool for a superior coffee experience that makes every cup special

fields.name: Kinto PourOver Coffee Dripper
fields.description: This pour over coffee dripper allows you to unlock the full potential of your coffee beans. The fine mesh, stainless steel filter eliminates the need for paper filters, which generate waste and strip the coffee of its full flavor. Leaving you to enjoy all the taste – with none of the waste!.

fields.name: Bodum Pour Over Coffee Maker with Red Rubber Handle
fields.description: Made from premium quality borosilicate glass that doesn’t absorb taste or aroma, the beautifully shaped carafe is fitted with a permanent stainless steel filter for truly sustainable brewing. No wasteful paper filters that trap essential oils and flavor; just pure flavorsome coffee

fields.name: Pump Manual Espresso Machine
fields.description: You can use both ground espresso coffee and E.S.E pods in the Handpresso Pump portable espresso maker. Handpresso has indeed created an espresso machine with the ultimate versatility. No electricity is needed

fields.name: Mocca Vacuum Coffee Maker With Burner And Accessories
fields.description: The vacuum coffee brewing method has long captivated coffee enthusiasts, as it ensures that all the precious oils are extracted from the coffee beans. The result is coffee that’s deliciously pure in aroma with a light body and heavenly taste. Thanks to the glass construction, you can admire the eye-catching brewing process before savoring your coffee
